# ADPA .NET Project Instructions

This is an ADPA (Automated Data Processing Application) .NET project built with C# Web API.

## Project Structure
- Web API with RESTful endpoints
- Clean architecture with Controllers, Models, Services
- Entity Framework Core for data access
- Dependency injection
- Swagger/OpenAPI documentation

## Development Guidelines
- Follow C# naming conventions
- Use async/await patterns for I/O operations
- Implement proper error handling and logging
- Write unit tests for business logic
- Use configuration settings for environment-specific values

## Code Style
- Use PascalCase for public members
- Use camelCase for private fields and parameters
- Add XML documentation comments for public APIs
- Follow SOLID principles
